uientry.s:
-- The faction global is set via the script
function OnSelect() UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent()):LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction) end

-- The faction global is set via the script
function OnSelect() UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent()):LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction) end

-- The faction global is set via the script
function OnSelect() UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent()):LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction) end

-- The faction global is set via the script
function OnSelect() UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent()):LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction) end

uientry.unicode: Scroll through playable nations.||Each nation has its own individual characteristics and occupies different areas on the map.||As you scroll through the national flags the information below will change.||You can browse each nation and their details before deciding upon which one to use.
uientry.s:
local clicked = false local over = false local last_upate = 0
function OnMouseOn() over = true end
function OnMouseOff() over = false end
function OnClickDown() clicked = true last_update = 0 end
function OnClickUp() clicked = false end
function OnUpdate(time) if over == true and clicked == true and time - last_update > 500 then last_update = time OnSelect() end end
function OnSelect()
local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("faction_selection"))
panel:LuaCall("SelectNextFaction")
end

uientry.unicode: Scroll through playable nations.||Each nation has its own individual characteristics and occupies different areas on the map.||As you scroll through the national flags the information below will change.||You can browse each nation and their details before deciding upon which one to use.
uientry.s:
local clicked = false local over = false local last_upate = 0
function OnMouseOn() over = true end
function OnMouseOff() over = false end
function OnClickDown() clicked = true last_update = 0 end
function OnClickUp() clicked = false end
function OnUpdate(time) if over == true and clicked == true and time - last_update > 500 then last_update = time OnSelect() end end
function OnSelect()
local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("faction_selection"))
panel:LuaCall("SelectPrevFaction")
end

-- The faction global is set via the script
function OnSelect() UIComponent(UIComponent(Address):Parent()):LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction) end
